ygData.subject: re> soerbairds
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow minstrels I must comment on the subject of a certain bard guild.  And for the record of their number, but i must say that you will not find a guild in
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow minstrels I must comment on the subject of a certain bard guild. And for the record of their number, but i must say that you will not find a guild in Norrath with better spending of thier funds. If you wish to join a guild that does not charge such high dues try the Bleeding Hearts, but also do not expect the kind of support that you will get from the Soerbairds.

Working for the unification of all Bards,
Torenithus Legendmaker
Bard of Queynos
Bristlebane
